code: import{useLocalization}from"./LocalizationContext";import translationsEn from"../locales/en.json";import translationsEs from"../locales/es.json";import translationsSe from"../locales/se.json";export var useTranslation=function useTranslation(){var _useLocalization=useLocalization(),language=_useLocalization.language,setLanguage=_useLocalization.setLanguage;var translationsMap={en:translationsEn,es:translationsEs,se:translationsSe};var translations=translationsMap[language]||translationsMap['en'];var translate=function translate(key){return key.split(".").reduce(function(obj,k){return(obj||{})[k];},translations);};return{translate:translate,setLanguage:setLanguage};};
